name: Kayvan Mazaheri
body:
## Education
- B.Sc. in **Software Engineering**  
[Isfahan University of Technology](http://www.iut.ac.ir/en), Iran (2014 - Present) 

- Diploma in Physics and Mathematics Discipline  
Shahid Ejei High School ([NODET](https://goo.gl/jiKsXJ)), Isfahan, Iran (2010 - 2014)  

--------------------------

## Interests

- Algorithms
- Data Science
- Competitive Programming

--------------------------

## Honors and Awards

- **5th Place** in the 
    **ACM-ICPC West Asia Regional**  
Tehran, Iran, 
December 24-25, 2015

- **10th Place** in the 
    **ACM-ICPC West Asia Regional**  
Tehran, Iran, 
December 18-19, 2014

- View my other ICPC records at my [ICPCID](https://icpc.baylor.edu/ICPCID/JT88SZOF1FWA)

--------------------------

## Technical Skills

- **Programming Languages:** C/C++, Java, Python.
- **Web Programming/DMBS:** MySQL, PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
- **Operating Systems:** Linux, Windows.
- **Microcontrollers:** AVR.
- **Electronics:** Circuit Design and PCB Design.

--------------------------

## Courses Taken

- Data Structures and Algorithms
- Discrete Mathematics **[ 20/20 ]**
- Advanced Programming **[ 20/20 ]**
- Fundamental of Computer Programming **[ 20/20 ]**
- ...

--------------------------

## Languages

- **Farsi** : Native
- **English** : Fluent (Reading, Speaking, Listening, Writing)
